forecast.name: Washington's Birthday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. Northwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends on Downtown San Francisco, the air is imbued with a crispness that carries the promise of an idyllic evening. The sky is painted in soft pastels, a gentle farewell to the day, with diminishing sunlight casting a warm glow on the cityscape. The forecast suggests a continuation of this cheerful weather through the evening, with mostly sunny conditions expected to give way to a comfortable night whose chill will encourage layered attire—think a light jacket over your favorite sweater, perhaps even a scarf as the breeze picks up slightly. 

The view from atop Sutro Tower reveals that while the city remains largely free of fog, the faint whisper of the marine layer can be sensed drifting along the horizon, its presence most notable near the iconic Golden Gate Bridge. This fleeting veiling adds a hint of mystery, inviting the curious to ponder the stories hidden within that ethereal embrace. With the tranquil scenery and mild temperatures, the evening beckons you to take a leisurely stroll through the streets or perhaps settle into an out-of-the-way café to sip coffee while watching the world saunter by, each person a vessel of their own stories.
